doc.title: Kenyuu densetsu Yaiba
doc.plot: Yaiba Kurogane, with his two animal pets (a vulture and a tiger), leaves his home in a island and goes to Tokyo for to becoming in a great samurai like his father, living with the Mine family with Sayaka, his best friend. In this moment a classmate of Yaiba, Takeshi Onimaru, turns in a demon for to rule the world, being called 'Devil of Wind'. Yaiba and his friends Musashi Miyamoto, Jubei Yagyu and Kojiro Sazaki will fight for to defeat to Takeshi and his demon soldiers, at the same time what other enemy, Princess Moon, wake up of his dream and like Takeshi she too wish to rule the world, doing more dangerous the Yaiba's mission. With his magic sword, 'Sword of God of Thunder', Yaiba and company will fight for the liberty.
